casebody.data:
Submitted on record and briefs December 19, 1991, STATE OF OREGON, Respondent, v. GREGORY A. GUIDO, Appellant. (90CR2288, 90CR2108; CA A67678) 822 P2d 760 Sally L. Avera, Public Defender, and J. Marvin Kuhn, Chief Deputy Public Defender, Salem, filed the brief for appellant. Dave Frohnmayer, Attorney General, Virginia L. Linder, Solicitor General, and Timothy A. Sylwester, Assistant Attorney General, Salem, filed the brief for respondent. PER CURIAM

reversed and remanded with instructions to dismiss indictment in 90CR2108; judgment reversed in part and remanded with instructions in 90CR2288; otherwise affirmed January 22,

reconsideration denied April 15,

petition for review allowed August 25, 1992 (314 Or 175)

Before Richardson, Presiding Judge, and Deits and Durham, Judges.
